hero.title: Hello, I'm Kemal
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer who prioritizes user experience with modern web technologies

about.title: About Me
about.description1: Hello! I'm Kemal, a passionate Full Stack Developer. I specialize in modern web technologies and develop innovative solutions that prioritize user experience.
about.description2: I love working with modern technologies like React, Next.js, Node.js, and TypeScript. I pay special attention to performance, security, and usability in every project.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: A modern e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features user-friendly interface, secure payment system, and admin panel.

taskManager.title: Task Management App
taskManager.description: A user-friendly task management application built with Next.js and Firebase. Features real-time updates and team collaboration capabilities.

blog.title: Blog Platform
blog.description: An SEO-friendly blog platform built with Next.js and Prisma. Features Markdown support, category system, and commenting functionality.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: A modern and responsive portfolio website built with Framer Motion animations and dark/light theme support.

apiGateway.title: API Gateway
apiGateway.description: An API Gateway for microservices architecture. Built with rate limiting, authentication, and load balancing features.

dashboard.title: Dashboard Analytics
dashboard.description: A real-time data analytics dashboard built with Chart.js and WebSocket integration.
